translation.en: Puppet, sir? Only 10 piastres .
translation.zh: 先生，买个木偶吧，只要十分钱

translation.en: They're crap. They fall apart before you're out the door.
translation.zh: 那是烂货，小鬼 撑不了多久就会散

translation.en: Five then, sir. It's handmade!
Please? My sister. She's very, very sick.
translation.zh: 求求你，我妹妹病得很重

translation.en: I know your sister. She's peddling in the next bar over.
translation.zh: 我认识她，她就在隔壁兜售

translation.en: Do you know my mother?
Nope. She's very, very sick.
I'll give you two.
That's a bad idea, you know.
Like feeding pigeons.
Do I know you? My name is Semelier.
I work for a private collector of rare antiquities. I cabled you last week.
translation.zh: 我为一位古董收藏家工作 上周拍过电报给你

translation.en: Yes.
And I didn't answer.
There's been a discovery in East Africa.
A Christian church, circa 5 A.D.
translation.zh: 是一座公元五百年的基督教堂

translation.en: No, that's not possible.
The Byzantine Empire had adopted Christianity at that time,
translation.zh: 当时拜占庭帝国已承认基督教

translation.en: but they never got that far south. Nevertheless, there it sits.
translation.zh: -但它的版图没到东非 -但是它确实存在

translation.en: The British have financed a dig to uncover this church.
translation.zh: 英国已经出资进行挖掘工作

translation.en: We believe a rare object waits inside.
translation.zh: 我们相信里头有一样珍品

translation.en: We'd like you to find it and bring it back to us.
translation.zh: 希望你能帮我们带出来

translation.en: So you think I'm a thief?
Now you think I'm a thief and a whore.
translation.zh: 你当我既是贼又是娼妓

translation.en: No...
simply a man who's lost faith in everything except himself.
translation.zh: 只是失去信仰、只相信自己的人

translation.en: You know nothing about me.
An Oxford-educated archeologist, an expert in religious icons.
translation.zh: 牛津毕业的考古学家 宗教圣像专家

translation.en: You were a priest before the war. So, what happened?
translation.zh: 你在战前是一名神父 后来怎么了？

translation.en: This is a leather impression of the artifact we're looking for.
translation.zh: 这是那件物品的复制品

translation.en: A representation of a mythical demon.
translation.zh: 是一个传说中的恶魔像

translation.en: It's Sumerian.
What makes you think it's in a church in Africa?
translation.zh: 你为什么觉得 它在非洲的教堂里？

translation.en: Major Granville in Nairobi is in charge of the dig.
translation.zh: 内罗毕的葛兰佛少校负责挖掘

translation.en: He's been persuaded to let you join it.
You're assuming that I will say yes.
translation.zh: 你凭什么认为我会答应？

translation.en: You already have.
MAN: March!
Left, left, right, left. Left....
translation.zh: （肯尼亚内罗毕，英军总部） 左，左，左，右，左 左…

translation.en: Left. Left, right, left. Left...
Mr. Merrin, sir. The major will see you now.
translation.zh: 墨林先生，少校可以见你了

translation.en: GRANVILLE: Beautiful, aren't they?
It's a hobby from school days. Works wonders for the nerves.
translation.zh: 学生时代培养的兴趣 很能舒缓焦虑

translation.en: You should try it sometime.
What can you tell me about the dig?
The location is a remote area of the Turkana district called Derati.
translation.zh: 地点在特卡纳区的偏远地带 叫做德拉提

translation.en: It was discovered several months ago
by a detachment of my men on maneuvers there.
translation.zh: 我的部队出操时发现的

translation.en: When the powers that be realized its importance, they organized a dig.
translation.zh: 上级了解到它的重要性 就组了挖掘队

translation.en: So, what have they learned so far?
That it's a church where no church should be.
translation.zh: 那是一座不该存在的教堂

translation.en: This is Father Francis.
He'll be accompanying you to Derati.
It's a pleasure to finally meet you, Father Merrin.
translation.zh: 终于见到你了，墨林神父

translation.en: I've read all your work at seminary. It's Mr. Merrin.
translation.zh: -我拜读过你的所有著作 -叫我墨林先生

translation.en: I was especially impressed with your treatise on the Roman rituals.
translation.zh: 你的天主教仪式专论尤其精辟

translation.en: I'm no longer a part of that.
But I'm sure you didn't come here to discuss Catholic rituals.
translation.zh: 你也不是来讨论天主教仪式的

translation.en: No, I was actually headed to Kenya to begin missionary work when Rome learned of the discovery.
translation.zh: 我要去肯尼亚传教时 教廷得知了这件事…

translation.en: They asked me to make sure the site's religious aspect have the proper consideration.
translation.zh: 我奉命去维护它的宗教地位

translation.en: How come you've opened the site to the Vatican?
translation.zh: 你们怎么会让教廷介入？

translation.en: We haven't...
officially.
You're both my guests.
Tell me, have you any theories on who might have built this church?
translation.zh: 你对建造者有任何想法吗？

translation.en: Well, not until I've seen it.
Surely the Vatican has some record of its creation?
translation.zh: 教廷一定有相关记载吧？

translation.en: No, I'm afraid not.
We're as in the dark about it as you are.
translation.zh: 我们跟你一样一无所知

translation.en: How long have you been with the dig, Chuma?
translation.zh: 朱玛你加入挖掘队多久？

translation.en: Since the beginning. The British hired me as an interpreter.
translation.zh: 从开挖就来了 英方找我来当翻译

translation.en: What happened here?
Plague. Ravaged the valley 50 years ago.
translation.zh: 瘟疫，五十年前在谷里肆虐

translation.en: How many died?
All of them.
I'm Lankester Merrin.
Major Granville should've contacted you about my joining the dig.
translation.zh: 少校应该有说我要来参与挖掘

translation.en: He did.
Is something bothering you, mate?
No. I'd like to see the dig site as soon as possible.
translation.zh: 没有，我想尽快看看现场

translation.en: Do you drink, Merrin? I shouldn't.
But my will is weak.
Then you might just survive this place.
I understand you've uncovered the church dome, but that progress has slowed down.
translation.zh: 听说教堂圆顶已经出土 但是进度变慢了

translation.en: You could say that. Right, doctor?
I'm Sarah Novak. Very nice to meet you. Lankester-- Lankester Merrin.
translation.zh: -我是莎拉·诺瓦，幸会 -我是兰卡斯特·墨林

translation.en: You still haven't made it by my room, doctor.
I've been having this swelling...
in the evening. Thought you might have something I could put on it.
translation.zh: 下体都会肿胀 你应该可以帮我治疗

translation.en: How about a muzzle?
So how are the interior excavations coming on?
translation.zh: 内部开挖工作的进展如何？

translation.en: They're not. No?
Has the structure collapsed?
No, the church is perfect, but none of the men will enter.
translation.zh: 没有，教堂好得很 但是剩下的工人…

translation.en: Those we have left, anyway. Why is that?
I shall be leaving for the dig in five minutes.
translation.zh: 我五分钟后出发去现场

translation.en: Pleasant fellow.
What's wrong with his face? Other than that it's attached to his body?
translation.zh: -他的脸怎么了？ -除了还跟身体连着之外？

translation.en: Could be an allergic reaction or some kind of localized infection.
translation.zh: 可能是过敏，或是局部感染

translation.en: Do you know why the men won't enter the church?
translation.zh: 你知道工人为什么不进教堂吗？

translation.en: Evil spirits... Oh.
if you believe the Turkana.
translation.zh: 如果你相信特卡纳人的话

translation.en: And do you?
No. I'm a doctor.
As a priest, surely you must believe in such things.
translation.zh: 但你是神父，你一定相信

translation.en: I'm an archeologist. I'm not a priest.
translation.zh: 我是考古学家，不是神父

translation.en: Now, that's funny. I met Father Francis outside, and he told me you were.
translation.zh: 奇怪了 弗朗西斯神父说你是神父

translation.en: Did he? Well, he is mistaken.
FRANCIS: Father Merrin.
This is Emekwi.
He's donating the use of a room in his hotel for the mission school.
translation.zh: 他的旅馆提供房间给教会办学

translation.en: Father, we are so glad that you are here.
These are my sons, James and Joseph.
translation.zh: 我的儿子，詹姆斯和约瑟夫

translation.en: Hello, James. Joseph. They are learning the Bible.
We are Christians, you know.
Emekwi, can you see to Mr. Merrin's bags?
translation.zh: 艾美奎，能帮墨林先生提行李吗？

translation.en: Of course. James, Joseph?
Very nice meeting you, doctor.
There's your goddamn church.
MERRIN: Is this your first assignment, Father?
translation.zh: 这是你的第一份工作吗？

translation.en: FRANCIS: Uh well, before this, I was studying in the archives in the Holy See.
translation.zh: 我之前在圣座的档案馆做研究

translation.en: The Vatican. Impressive. But not really training for missionary work, is it?
translation.zh: 教廷的人，了不起 但那不算是传教训练吧？

translation.en: This is strange.
It's 1500 years old.
It should be badly weathered.
It's almost as if it were buried right after it was built.
translation.zh: 它却像是刚盖好就入土了

translation.en: Chuma.
Where's Jefferies? I need to go into the church.
translation.zh: 杰弗里呢？我要进入教堂

translation.en: Hyenas.
They've been here ever since we started digging.
Even at daytime?
What's the matter with him? I don't know.
The heat?
Joseph?
Are you out here by yourself? It's dangerous.
I'm collecting rocks. I can see that.
I think you're about ready for this now.
translation.zh: 你应该可以用这个东西

translation.en: It's a tool for professional diggers.
His seizure stopped. I wanted to keep him at the hospital for observation,
translation.zh: 他停止发作了 我想让他留院观察

translation.en: but Turkana have stopped trusting my medicine.
translation.zh: 但特卡纳人不再相信我的医术

translation.en: Well, that must make your job very hard.
You have no idea.
Thank you.
What is it you hope to find here?
The answer to why a church was built here
translation.zh: 为什么在基督教传入的千百年前…

translation.en: a thousand years before Christianity arrived.
translation.zh: 会有座教堂建造在这里

translation.en: You were a priest once, weren't you?
Yes, I was.
Bloody savages!
Can't wipe their own ass without instruction.
I have to get back to town. Wait. I found this.
translation.zh: -我要回城里去 -等一下，我找到这条项链

translation.en: And I want you to have it.
It's a St. Joseph, for luck.
translation.zh: 这是圣何塞像，能带来好运

translation.en: Please. For my behavior.
translation.zh: 收下吧，就当我向你赔礼

translation.en: Thank you.
What the hell are you doing?
Get the fuck out of here, you little scab! Don't!
Joseph, wait. Don't do that.
All right, Merrin. I didn't know you was a fuzzy lover.
translation.zh: 很好，原来你喜欢这些卷毛人

translation.en: SARAH: It's okay. Come.
These little buggers get in everywhere.
How soon can you have the doors to the church uncovered?
A few days.
translation.zh: 教堂大门多久能出土？ -过几天 -那现在我们要怎么进去？

translation.en: And in the meantime, how do we get in?
translation.zh: -过几天 -那现在我们要怎么进去？

translation.en: "We" don't. Chuma will take you in through the roof.
translation.zh: 我不进去 朱玛会带你走屋顶

translation.en: Following us, Father?
Is it safe to walk around?
Let's see.
Lucifer. The Lord's favorite angel.
translation.zh: 路西法，上帝最喜爱的天使

translation.en: MERRIN: Cast out after the war in heaven.
translation.zh: 天堂之战后因叛变被驱逐

translation.en: Can't even trust angels, can you?
You ever seen anything like it? Not this far from Rome.
translation.zh: -你看过这种教堂吗？ -离罗马这么远的没有

translation.en: It's odd.
Churches were built to exalt heaven, but this...
translation.zh: 教堂是盖来颂扬天国，但这里

translation.en: The weapons are pointing downward.
Look behind you, Father.
Desecration of Christ.
Who would do something like this?
The crucifix was broken off from here.
translation.zh: 十字架是从这里折断的

translation.en: Chuma, is there an inventory of what's been found here?
translation.zh: 朱玛，这里的文物有列表吗？

translation.en: I wouldn't know. MERRIN: Who would know?
Because this place has been vandalized.
Probably the lead archeologist, Monsieur Bession.
translation.zh: 应该是首席考古学家，贝颂先生

translation.en: So where can I find him?
I need to talk to him.
It's not possible. Why not?
He's gone mad.
No one's been inside Bession's tent since he fell ill?
translation.zh: 贝颂发疯之后，就没人进去过？

translation.en: They are superstitious.
And you? Not superstitious. Smart.
Chuma!
Yes?
Where's Bession now? A sanatorium in Nairobi.
translation.zh: -贝颂现在人呢？ -在内罗毕的疗养院

translation.en: How long has he been gone?
A few weeks.
And he can read and write Aramaic? Sorry?
The language spoken in Palestine
translation.zh: 耶稣在世时巴勒斯坦的…

translation.en: at the time of Christ. And what does it say?
"The fallen shall rise in a river of blood."
Do you have a moment? Of course.
Can I get you some tea?
Or maybe something more substantial?
Yes, that would be very nice.
You dabble in the occult?
I found them here when I arrived.
I wanted to ask you, did you treat Bession?
translation.zh: 我想请问，你治疗过贝颂吗？

translation.en: You should let me clean that before it gets infected.
There was nothing I could do for Monsieur Bession.
He had no medical symptoms.
Nothing to suggest any kind of disease or infection.
translation.zh: 没有生病或感染的迹象

translation.en: His breakdown was purely mental. And extremely severe.
translation.zh: 他纯粹是精神崩溃 而且非常严重

translation.en: That's why the Turkana fear the church is cursed.
translation.zh: 所以本地人害怕教堂是被诅咒过的

translation.en: That and the disappearances.
In the past few weeks, we've lost a dozen men.
translation.zh: 最近几周有十几个人失踪

translation.en: Runaways?
Or is it those evil spirits? Yeah.
I'm sorry. I shouldn't have... Your curiosity's perfectly natural.
translation.zh: -对不起，我不该… -你会好奇也很自然

translation.en: My father was a strong man.
translation.zh: 我父亲是个意志坚定的人

translation.en: When the Nazis started rounding up the Jews in our town, he didn't hesitate.
translation.zh: 当纳粹开始抓捕犹太人时 他毫不犹豫…

translation.en: He hid our neighbors in the crawl space.
But someone turned us in, and we were all sent to the concentration camps.
translation.zh: 但是有人去告密 我们全都被送进了集中营

translation.en: I'm sorry.
People can't really understand, can they?
If they weren't there.
If they didn't see.
No.
My husband turned out to be one of those people.
I met him after the war, and we came to Africa together, in love.
translation.zh: 我在战后认识他 我们来到非洲，爱着对方

translation.en: One night I realized I-- I had to tell him the truth...
translation.zh: 有一晚我想我应该告诉他…

translation.en: ...about the Nazis and what they did to me.
After that, he never touched me again.
So...
What turns a man of the cloth into an archeologist?
translation.zh: 一个神父怎么会变成考古学家？

translation.en: I don't know, I suppose I--
I wanted to work with something real, something I could touch with my hands.
translation.zh: 我想接触看得见，摸得着的东西

translation.en: Do you miss it? Being a priest?
No. There's no point in that.
Sometimes I think the best view of God is from hell.
translation.zh: 有时从地狱看上帝是最好的角度

translation.en: I should get to bed.
I'm going to Nairobi tomorrow, to see Bession.
translation.zh: 我明天要去内罗毕看贝颂

translation.en: Talk to Father Gionetti. Gionetti?
He runs the sanitarium.
Well, thank you... for the medical care.
[WHISPERING] And deliver us from evil.
for thine is the kingdom and the power and the glory, forever and ever....
translation.zh: 国度、权柄、荣耀，全是您的 直到永远…

translation.en: Amen.
You, priest, what is your name?
I'm Father Merrin.
God is not here today, priest.
Want some water?
Hey. What's wrong?
It's late. You should go back to bed.
Give it to me! It's mine!
Oh, is it yours? Give it to me!
Mr. Merrin gave it to me.
Here, take it. Take it! Oh, just give it to me, you idiot!
translation.zh: -你来拿啊，来啊 -还给我啦，白痴

translation.en: Who are you calling idiot? Take it, it's right here!
Give it to me! It's mine! Shorty, shorty!
Just give it to me! All right, okay!
Go back to bed, and I'll give you the stupid thing.
Joseph, look out!
Joseph, get Papa, get Papa!
Joseph, help me!
Joseph, please, get Papa quickly!
JAMES: Help me! Help me!
JAMES: Help me! Papa, help me, please!
SARAH: What happened? Hyenas. They tore James apart.
translation.zh: -怎么回事？ -土狼撕咬了詹姆斯

translation.en: Did you see that, Lankester? The hyenas ignored Joseph.
translation.zh: 兰卡斯特，你看到了吗？ 土狼没理会约瑟夫

translation.en: They were focused on his brother. That was a lot more than focused.
translation.zh: -它们只顾着攻击詹姆斯 -不只是那样

translation.en: They acted as if he wasn't even there.
translation.zh: 它们彷佛当约瑟夫不存在

translation.en: Can you see? Can you hear?
Monsieur Bession?
Mr. Bession.
You worked on a dig in Derati.
translation.zh: 你参与德拉提的挖掘工作

translation.en: You drew a picture of an idol.
Where did you see it? Was it in the church?
translation.zh: 是在哪里看到的？ 教堂里吗？

translation.en: MERRIN: Monsieur Bession.
Father Merrin. How do you know my name?
translation.zh: -墨林神父 -你怎么知道我的名字？

translation.en: I said, how do you know my name?
translation.zh: 你怎么会知道我的名字？

translation.en: Are you hurt?
No.
I'm free.
God is not here today, priest.
I hope he finds peace.
I'm Father Gionetti.
I've been waiting for you.
MERRIN: How did he know my name?
Have you drifted so far from God, Merrin, that you can't see?
translation.zh: 是疏离上帝使得你如此蒙昧吗？

translation.en: Monsieur Bession was touched by the devil.
translation.zh: 贝颂先生是受了恶魔影响

translation.en: Demonic possession? Forgive me, Father.
translation.zh: 魔鬼附身？恕我无法茍同

translation.en: I never said he was possessed. Only touched.
translation.zh: 我没说附身，我只说影响

translation.en: So, touched. What does that mean?
In 1647, the Ursuline Convent in Loudun, France
was plagued by possession.
Thirty-four nuns had been touched by the devil, committing unspeakable acts.
translation.zh: 34名修女受恶魔影响 做出不堪的行为

translation.en: Having orgies including goats doesn't make them possessed, simply horny...
translation.zh: 跟山羊交媾不是附身，是欲火难耐…

translation.en: and inventive.
Four priests were dispatched to exorcise the demons.
Three of them were possessed themselves and subsequently died.
translation.zh: 其中三名也被附身，最后丧命

translation.en: The last one was driven insane by his brush...
translation.zh: 第四名因为与恶魔接触…

translation.en: with evil.
That is what happened to Monsieur Bession.
And that evil remains in Derati.
You must be careful there.
Remember, he is the father of lies.
He will seek to poison your mind.
translation.zh: 他会设法荼毒你的心智

translation.en: You will need this against him.
The Roman Rituals.
If you need somebody to perform an exorcism, I'm not your man.
translation.zh: 如果你要找人驱魔 那你找错人了

translation.en: I'm not a priest anymore.
You will always be a priest, Father Merrin.
Only your faith can save you.
translation.zh: 只有你的信仰能拯救你

translation.en: Well, then, I'm doomed.
Joseph?
What do you have there?
Can I see?
You threw it away.
Jefferies, what the hell are you doing in here?
It was in the dirt outside, you threw it away.
translation.zh: 它在外面的地上，你把它扔了

translation.en: No, I didn't.
The clasp must have come loose. Liar!
Do I repulse you that much?
Maybe if you could cure my fucking face,
I might look as good to you as that archeologist.
translation.zh: 我也能跟那个考古的一样帅

translation.en: Joseph?
[WHISPERS] He's coming for you.
What?
[NORMAL VOICE] He's coming for you.
What happened? I had a bad dream.
Don't worry.
You'll be fine.
Where is everybody?
Sebituana's baby is coming, so the village has gathered in welcome. Oh. [DOOR SLAMS]
translation.zh: 去庆祝酋长的老婆生小孩

translation.en: Joseph.
Hey.
Joseph.
You're back.
Are you all right? Yeah, I'm just a little bit tired.
These lesions...
they're not from the shock, are they?
translation.zh: -不是受惊吓所引起的吧？ -不是

translation.en: No. They're completely asymptomatic.
translation.zh: -不是受惊吓所引起的吧？ -不是 与病症完全无关

translation.en: It just doesn't make sense.
He should have recovered by now. So, what is it?
translation.zh: -他早就该好了 -原因到底是什么？

translation.en: In this part of the world...
it could be a dozen things.
But his symptoms don't really match any of them.
translation.zh: 但是他的症状又都不符合

translation.en: So all I can do is just watch and wait.
I have to do some work up at the dig.
Will you be all right? Yes.
Come sit with me, Lankester.
I promise I won't bite.
What is it?
How was Nairobi? Oh, fine.
Did you see Monsieur Bession? He's dead.
translation.zh: -你有见到贝颂先生吗？ -他死了

translation.en: How? I don't know.
Some accident.
I just don't understand.
Everything that's happening here...
It seems like I can't help anyone anymore.
translation.zh: 我好像再也无法帮助任何人

translation.en: Hey.
Easy.
Help me hold him.
Emekwi.
I'm doing everything I can for him.
Joseph?
It's this place, Lankester. The Turkana are right, it's cursed.
translation.zh: 这个地方有问题 本地人说得对，这里被诅咒了

translation.en: Sarah. You don't understand.
What they did to me in the camp. They--
There's nothing left to bleed.
There is something here, something evil.
translation.zh: 这里有一股邪恶的力量

translation.en: Sarah, it's so much easier to believe
translation.zh: 要相信邪魔存在太容易了

translation.en: in evil as an entity, but it's not.
translation.zh: 要相信邪魔存在太容易了 但没这回事

translation.en: It's a purely human condition inside all of us.
translation.zh: 这都是人的心理在作祟

translation.en: Did Bession talk about what he found under the church?
translation.zh: 贝颂提过教堂下面的发现吗？

translation.en: There's an ancient temple below, a pagan place,
where they used to conduct sacrifices, human sacrifices.
translation.zh: 是异教徒的祭坛，祭的是活人

translation.en: Why would they build a church on top of something like that?
translation.zh: 为什么要在那种地方上盖教堂？

translation.en: Perhaps to purify the site.
But then, why bury it?
Merrin!
You better come with me.
Jefferies didn't show up for the dig this morning.
He wasn't in his room, so they came to the bar, and they found...
translation.zh: 也不在房里，他们来酒吧发现…

translation.en: Chief Sebituana's baby was stillborn last night.
He blames the whites.
You think the Turkana took Jefferies?
translation.zh: 你觉得特卡纳人捉了杰弗里吗？

translation.en: I think this place is on the verge of an uprising.
I've contacted Major Granville. A detachment will be here by this afternoon.
translation.zh: 我联络了葛兰佛少校 下午之前会有部队过来

translation.en: You disagree?
In my experience, bringing soldiers into a situation is always a bad idea.
translation.zh: 根据我的经验 把军队扯进来都没好事

translation.en: MERRIN: Who buried them?
Everybody died.
Who buried them?
MAN: All right.
Out!
Major Granville. Hello, Peter.
MAN: Come on. Out you get. Move it, Wilkins.
translation.zh: 快点下车，快点，威尔金斯

translation.en: Any answers on Jefferies? I'm afraid not.
Well, you did the right thing calling me, Father.
I've been in these situations before, and you have to stay on top of--
translation.zh: 我见过这种状况，你得制住…

translation.en: On top of these people.
I'm not sure the Turkana are responsible for what's happening here, Major.
translation.zh: 这些事应该与特卡纳人无关

translation.en: Major Granville?
This dig is too important to jeopardize,
translation.zh: 这个发现太重要，不能出差错 在我确定…

translation.en: and until I'm satisfied that the excavation is secure,
translation.zh: 这个发现太重要，不能出差错 在我确定… 安全无虞前，英军将掌管一切

translation.en: the British army will assume complete control.
translation.zh: 安全无虞前，英军将掌管一切

translation.en: The Turkana won't like the show of force. I'm not concerned with what the Turkana like, Mr. Merrin.
translation.zh: -特卡纳人可不喜欢… -我才不管他们喜欢什么

translation.en: And if they start any more trouble,
they will have to answer to the might of His Majesty King George.
translation.zh: 就得向英王乔治六世的军队交代

translation.en: You cannot be here.
Please tell Sebituana I'm sorry for his loss.
You are not welcome here.
I want to know about the plague that destroyed this village 50 years ago.
translation.zh: 我想知道五十年前 是什么瘟疫侵袭这里

translation.en: It was not a plague.
So, what was it?
The evil in your church, it has taken Emekwi's youngest son...
translation.zh: 你们教堂里的魔鬼 控制了艾美奎的小儿子

translation.en: and it is getting stronger.
You must abandon your work... or we'll be forced to stop you.
translation.zh: 你们必须停止挖掘 否则我们只好出面阻止

translation.en: So you don't want to tell me?
He says he doesn't have to tell you, because it's happening again...
translation.zh: 他说他不必多说 因为历史又重演了

translation.en: right now.
You don't bury your dead. You cremate them.
translation.zh: 你们行的不是土葬，而是火葬

translation.en: Yes. Then who's buried in that graveyard?
I'm sorry.
What are you--?
I'm sorry.
Daddy.
I will shoot 10, priest...
and you will choose.
I can't do that.
No!
Now you choose...
or I will kill them all.
Are you praying?
To God?
Shoot me.
God is not here today, priest.
[CRYING] Papa.
They're empty. What?
I dug up three graves. They were all empty. What happened here?
translation.zh: 我挖了三个都是空的 怎么回事？

translation.en: I don't know. Oh, yes, you do.
You've been lying to me since we got here.
Let go of me. Damn it!
translation.zh: -你一直在骗我 -放开我 该死的，坟上和棺材上…

translation.en: There are crosses on the graves.
There are crosses on the coffins.
The church buried them, didn't they?
Didn't they?
Yes.
Why?
What were they hiding?
That this place is damned. [SCOFFS]
No! You asked the question! Now you're gonna listen to the answer!
translation.zh: 你问了问题就要把答案听完

translation.en: There was a massacre here...
1500 years ago.
An army from the West, led by two priests,
translation.zh: 两名神父率领一支西方军队…

translation.en: searching for the origin of a powerful evil.
translation.zh: 前来寻找一个强大邪魔的出处

translation.en: But when they got here, that evil consumed them,
translation.zh: 但是他们在这里遭到附身

translation.en: turning the soldiers against each other in a bloodbath.
Only a single priest survived. When that priest made it back to the Emperor Justinian,
translation.zh: 只有一名神父存活下来 他回到查士丁尼大帝御前…

translation.en: he ordered that a church be built over the site and then buried to seal the evil inside.
translation.zh: 下令在那里盖一座教堂并埋起来 好将邪魔封印

translation.en: All mention of it was to be stricken from the history texts forever.
translation.zh: 相关记载都应该全数删除

translation.en: But it wasn't.
No.
a Vatican researcher found an ancient letter in the archives.
translation.zh: 一名教廷学者发现了一封信

translation.en: Four priests came to examine the site,
translation.zh: 四名神父前来查看那个地点

translation.en: enlisting the help of the people of this valley in their search,
translation.zh: 并且找本地居民帮忙搜寻

translation.en: and they all disappeared.
Where did they go?
No one knows.
The Vatican ordered a cover-up...
the false graveyard.
The tale of a plague to....
To scare people away.
And then the British stumbled across it.
And I was sent here to see if the legend was real.
translation.zh: 我奉命来查证传说是否属实

translation.en: What legend?
That after the war in heaven...
this is the spot where Lucifer fell.
God brought you here, Lankester.
Leave me alone.
No.
No.
The devil is here...
inside that boy.
The Turkana know it.
They came to drive the devil from him, and he almost killed them.
translation.zh: 他们跑来驱魔，差点送命

translation.en: You can't run from this.
You must help me.
I can't.
But you've seen what's going on here.
You have to believe.
I believe in nothing.
They've found Jefferies.
Major Granville. Wait.
Get him down.
Get him down!
You all right, Major?
Savages.
Major.
Major!
Bloody savages. JOMO: Why are you here?
translation.zh: -该死的野蛮人 -你们为什么要来？

translation.en: Granville! JOMO: You have no business to be here!
JOMO: You must leave. Granville!
JOMO: You people have plundered our ancestors.
translation.zh: 你们已经害死我们的先人

translation.en: You must return Turkana to us now. MERRIN: Let me through!
translation.zh: -你们得把特卡纳还给我们 -让我过

translation.en: JOMO: It's time to go. You have already polluted our lives.
translation.zh: 你们该走了 你们玷污了我们的生活

translation.en: You came here with your evil.
We knew peace before you came.
translation.zh: -我们原本过得很平静 -葛兰佛

translation.en: No!
CHUMA: They think it's inside Joseph. They believe the evil is upon us.
translation.zh: 他们认为约瑟夫被附身 他们相信这里有魔鬼

translation.en: Chuma!
Merrin?
They believe it is inside Joseph. They're going to kill him.
translation.zh: 他们认定约瑟夫被附身 他们会杀了他

translation.en: Now, please...
go.
Sir, the Turkana are preparing to attack.
translation.zh: 少校，特卡纳人准备发动攻击

translation.en: Leave me.
Sir?
I said, leave me.
Yes, sir.
We must leave now. Why?
Where's Sarah? I don't know.
Take the boy to Nairobi.
Father Gionetti.
FRANCIS: Why?
Turkana are coming to kill him.
It's a sandstorm.
It won't let us leave.
We have to hide him.
The church. No.
The Turkana won't go in there. It's his only chance.
translation.zh: 特卡纳人不会进去那里 这是他唯一的生机

translation.en: Aren't you coming? I have to find Sarah.
We'll meet you.
Francis.
Now go.
Sarah?
[WHISPERS] The Lord is coming for you.
Sarah?
Sarah?
Sarah? [KNOCKING]
Sarah!
Oh, my God.
Bession was Sarah's husband?
Yes.
She went into the church with him, didn't she?
It's not Joseph.
It's Sarah.
Ready yourselves, men!
MAN: Fire!
Chuma.
Francis?
Francis?
Francis.
O, Lord, forgive my disbelief.
I need you.
These people need you. This valley needs you.
translation.zh: 这些人需要你，这里需要你

translation.en: Hear my cry.
Do not abandon me now.
Forgive my sins.
Joseph.
[DEMONIC VOICE] Come sit with us, Lankester.
I promise I won't bite.
Joseph, run.
He's mine.
Run.
Leave him alone.
It's me you want.
I am a fallen priest.
Lord, have mercy on us.
Christ, have mercy on us. Lord, have mercy on us.
translation.zh: 基督怜悯我们 主怜悯我们

translation.en: God, Father in heaven, have mercy on us.
God, the Son, redeemer of the world, have mercy on us.
God, the Holy Spirit, have mercy on us.
Christ, hear us.
Holy Mary, pray for us.
Christ, hear us.
Lord, have mercy on us.
What's the matter, Merrin?
Don't you wanna fuck me anymore?
All ye holy angels and archangels, pray for us!
translation.zh: 列位圣天使与天使长 请为我们祷告

translation.en: All ye holy orders of blessed spirits, [LAUGHS] pray for us!
translation.zh: 列位神前的圣灵 请为我们祷告

translation.en: Why would he listen to you?
You.
You believe in nothing.
You're all alone.
Without hope.
Almighty Lord and father of Jesus Christ...
translation.zh: 全能的主，耶稣基督的父

translation.en: grant me, your unworthy servant, pardon for my sins...
translation.zh: 你卑微的仆人祈求你 原谅我所有的罪

translation.en: and the power to fight this cruel--
Joseph, come on.
Don't be afraid. No! Father!
MERRIN: Joseph. JOSEPH: Father Merrin....
Help me.
Joseph!
Oh, Lord...
by your name, save me.
By your strength, defend my cause.
translation.zh: 以你的力量护卫我的目标

translation.en: Joseph.
Joseph.
Joseph, wait.
Joseph. JOSEPH [ECHOING]: Father.
I'm coming.
O, God, hear my prayer.
The ruthless seek my life. They do not keep God before them.
translation.zh: 恶人吞噬了我 他们眼前没有上帝

translation.en: Turn back the evil upon my foes.
In your faithfulness, destroy them.
Where is your God now, Merrin?
Fucking his only son while you call out his name?
translation.zh: 当你呼唤他时 同时凌虐他的圣子？

translation.en: He doesn't care about this whore. But you do...
translation.zh: 他不在乎这个贱人 但是你在乎

translation.en: because you want to shove your rotten cock up her juicy ass.
translation.zh: 因为你想拿肉棒塞她的屁眼

translation.en: You can't have her, priest. The whore is mine.
translation.zh: 你不能拥有她，她是我的

translation.en: And I'll kill her before I let you take her from me.
translation.zh: 我会在你抢走她之前先杀了她

translation.en: For the soul's made to the image and likeness of God...
translation.zh: 以拥有上帝形貌的世人的力量

translation.en: I cast you out!
You're a killer, Merrin.
You looked them in the eye, pointed, and they died.
translation.zh: 你看着他们，伸手一指 他们就死翘翘了

translation.en: [GERMAN OFFICER'S VOICE] God is not here today, priest.
Oh, yes, he is.
You're going to watch him die, Merrin Fail him like you failed all the others.
translation.zh: 你会眼睁睁看他死 像辜负其他人一样辜负他

translation.en: God, spare this child, for he is innocent...
translation.zh: 上帝救救这孩子，他是无辜的

translation.en: and deserves your blessing. God, spare this child...
translation.zh: 理应受您保佑 上帝，救救这孩子吧

translation.en: for he is innocent and deserves your blessing.
translation.zh: 他是无辜的 理应受您保佑

translation.en: God, spare this child, for he is innocent and deserves your blessing.
translation.zh: 上帝救救这孩子 他是无辜的，理应受您保佑

translation.en: I command you to depart! It's the power of Christ that compels you!
translation.zh: 我命令你离开 以基督的力量逼迫你

translation.en: It is God himself who commands you. It is the majestic Christ who commands you.
translation.zh: 全能的上帝命令你 伟大的基督命令你

translation.en: God, the Father, commands you. God, the Son, commands you.
God, the Holy Spirit commands you. The mystery of the cross commands you.
translation.zh: 圣灵命令你 十字架的圣号命令你

translation.en: Unclean spirit, I cast you out!
[NORMAL VOICE] Lankester.
Sarah, Sarah.
It's over now.
Joseph, Joseph.
Father.
Don't be afraid. I need your help, Joseph.
Listen, whatever you hear, whatever you see, it's just his lies.
translation.zh: 听我说，不管你听到看到什么 都是他的谎言

translation.en: Don't listen. Don't watch. You understand?
Don't listen!
It's just lies. You have to be strong and concentrate.
translation.zh: 那是骗人的 你要坚强，要专心

translation.en: Can you read this?
I will start there. Then you will answer.
translation.zh: 我从这里开始念，然后你回答

translation.en: That's me. That's you. That's me, and that's you. You understand?
Good.
Let's start.
O, God, by your name, save me.
"Amen."
Save your servant.
JOSEPH: "Who places his trust in thee, my God."
translation.zh: 他一心信靠你，我的上帝

translation.en: Be unto her, O, Lord, a fortified tower.
translation.zh: 在她上方，筑起一座坚塔

translation.en: JOSEPH: "In the face of the enemy."
O, Lord, hear my prayer.
"And let my cry come unto thee."
The Lord be with you. "And also with you."
Be gone, evil spirit...
In the name of the Father and of the Son...
and of the Holy Ghost.
By the sign of this Holy Cross...
by our Lord Jesus Christ...
God, the Holy Ghost, commands you!
The blood of the martyrs commands you!
In God's name, demon!
I cast you out!
Sarah.
Sarah.
Okay?
[NORMAL VOICE] Thank you.
Sarah. What is it?
What is it, Sarah?
Help. Help!
Lankester. No.
Help.
No. Help.
Sarah.
[WHISPERS] Father.
She's with God now.
She's with God.
I trust your mission was successful.
I couldn't find what you were looking for.
translation.zh: 我找不到你们要的东西

translation.en: But you found something.
Didn't you?
Goodbye, Mr. Semelier.
Au revoir , Mr. Merrin.
It's Father Merrin.
